name: A Christmas Conundrum!
description:
Santa crashes his sleigh with only 10 minutes left to Christmas and the remaining presents are scattered throughout the neighborhood.  Take control of Santa as you recover the final presents and try to get them under the right trees before sunrise! 

Submission for the 32 Bit Holiday Game Jam 2021, aiming for a mostly-Playstation One style.

Controls:

Movement - WASD 

Interact - E

Updates: 

12/28/21 v2 - Re-fixed game getting frozen on final score

12/28/21 - Fixed hang-ups while moving around houses, fixed end-game UI, fixed new game reset

Known Issues: 

MacOS version is not signed. Must open from Finder window and approve application.
